Name: Château de Montsoreau
Notes: Ruinous by late 19th century, restored, houses the Musée des Goums Marocains.

Name: Château du Plessis-Bourré
Notes: Externally unchanged since the 15th century, working drawbridge.

Name: Château de Pouancé
Notes: Considered second fortress of Anjou, after Angers.

Name: Château de Saumur
Notes: Page for September in the Tres Riches Heures du Duc de Berry depicts the Chateau as it looked in 1410.

Name: Château de la Turmelière
Notes: 19th century building of same name nearby.
